snippet.title: Dragon's Wandering Tavern Reveal Trailer
snippet.description: Wander the ever-shifting forest in the Studio Ghibli-inspired, peaceful management game, Dragon's Wandering Tavern. Craft items, brew magical potions, cook delicious meals for your friends, and assemble a family of cute and quirky creatures who will join you on your adventure. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1672180/Dragons_Wandering_Tavern/ #cozygames #ghibli #cozygamer
